thread.title: San Francisco 'No Tech Zone' sign goes viral, through tech
thread.title_full: San Francisco 'No Tech Zone' sign goes viral, through tech - SFGate

author: sfgate.com
title: San Francisco 'No Tech Zone' sign goes viral, through tech
text:
An official looking "No Tech Zone" sign popped up in Alamo Square Tuesday.
"No tech zone" around Alamo Square Park? Have you lost your mind, SF? (Photo illegally taken by @AdamSinger ) pic.twitter.com/Z0iIPU4Lhh 
— Ashley Mayer (@ashleymayer) September 22, 2015 Passersby ignored the warning of the $300 fee and immediately starting taking photos of the sign... on their phones. Social media sites responded with glee.
These signs in SF. I must say I'd love to see this in certain places!! http://t.co/9ZRwVsCRbF pic.twitter.com/KUtI1h7mFP 
— NiallHarbison (@NiallHarbison) September 21, 2015 San Francisco city officials told the Guardian that the city had not posted the notice, and the sign has already been removed by its anonymous creator.
